sentences.en: a white blouse with frills at the cuffs
sentences.cn: 袖口上有褶边的女衬衫

sentences.en: A yellow blouse goes with her blonde hair.
sentences.cn: 黄色短上衣和她的金发很相称.

sentences.en: Her blouse has a ruffle of lace around the neck.
sentences.cn: 她的衬衫领子镶有褶裥花边.

sentences.en: I always spatter my blouse with gravy when I eat.
sentences.cn: 吃饭的时候，我总是把肉汁溅到衬衣上。

sentences.en: She couldn't rub off the blood stain on her blouse.
sentences.cn: 她没法将上衣的血渍擦掉.

sentences.en: She had begun to unbutton her blouse.
She was wearing a skirt and blouse.
She was wearing a white ruffled blouse and a blue velvet skirt.
sentences.cn: 她穿着一件有花边的白色上衣和一条蓝色天鹅绒裙子。

sentences.en: The new coats blouse gracefully above the hip line.
sentences.cn: 新外套在臀围线上优美地打着褶皱.

sentences.en: The spring breeze lifted the edge of her blouse.
Wash the blouse in warm soapy water.
sentences.cn: 这件女衬衫要用温的肥皂水洗。

sentences.en: Will you please mend the sleeve of my blouse?
sentences.cn: 请你把我衬衣的袖子补一下好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Your blouse has rucked up at the back.
sentences.cn: 你的衬衫后面起褶儿了.

phrases.tran_cn: 软弱的男人，懦夫，过于敏感的人
